title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Lonafarnib in Hutchinson-Gilford Progeria Syndrome
brief_summary: A phase I study evaluating the safety, tolerability, and preliminary efficacy of lonafarnib in children with Progeria.
description: This study aims to determine the maximum tolerated dose of lonafarnib and observe its effects on cardiovascular and metabolic parameters in patients with Hutchinson-Gilford Progeria Syndrome.

inclusion_criteria.criterion: Confirmed diagnosis of Hutchinson-Gilford Progeria Syndrome.

exclusion_criteria.criterion: Concurrent participation in another clinical trial.

data_security_details: All patient data is encrypted and access is controlled via multi-factor authentication in accordance with HIPAA.
